subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text: /sihi<small>1</small>to<small>2</small>me<small>1</small>/: [shipitwome] → [shiɸitwome] → [shiɸitome]. Compound of {{m|ja|舅||in law|tr=shihito}} and {{m|ja|女||woman|tr=me}}. See next entry.
